title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2009 - PES SMoKE Patch 1.2
description:
Pro Evolution Soccer 2009 - PES SMoKE Patch 1.2

Some of the features:

- 16 new national teams with correct player name and kits 
- Championship teams replace Ligue 1.
- Bundesliga replaces Eredivisie
- Ligue 1 moved to Other Leagues A
- Some of Eredivisie teams moved to Other Leagues A
- Other Leagues A and B can be used in Master League mode
- New faces, balls, referee and banners
- All players available in master league mode (except classic players)
- Belarus replaces israel
- All 32 correct teams in Champions League mode with correct kits
- GDB kits for every team
- New stadiums and turfs
- All latest transfers
- Correct player names
- Correct competition names
- Correct trophies in BAL mode
- And much more


Installation:

1. Decompress the file
2. Copy (PES2009_EDIT01.bin) in the SAVE folder, should be (C:Documents and Settings???My DocumentsKONAMIPro Evolution Soccer 2009save), replace old file if it asks.
3. Copy the kitserver folder in the Pro Evolution Soccer 2009 installation folder, should be: (C:Program FilesKONAMIPro Evolution Soccer 2009), then open the kitserver folder and run (setup.exe) then click install, then close.
P.S.: Directories are the ones by default installation, if you have changed the defaults use your directories.


change log:

PES SMoKE Patch 1.2:

- added more than 300 new faces.
- fixed the balls names and preview balls
- fixed in game ball curser (replaced the original with a nice small circle curser)
- updated kits
- fixed faces links
- Real names for hidden players
- created missing players
- fixed some things you may not notice :)

PES SMoKE Patch 1.1 (not released):

- optimized some graphics so the game can load faster for low end PCs
- fixed BAL mode possible crash when playing international games.
